Articles.Content:
New player to KSP and one of the things that impressed me right off was the soundtrack. Its absolutely perfect for this game. Then I discovered that all the music was created be Kevin MacLeod. Next I found Kevin's website and download a bunch of his other stuff. Now I have a KSP spotify playlist with all of Kevins stuff from the game and more.

So here's my suggestion, and this is a small one. I think a new kerbanot should be added to the astronaut complex named Kevin Kerman or MacLeod Kerman in tribute to this great musician. Oh, hes also gotta be one of the orange suit guys of course.
nice idea. i discovered this my self, I knew about him before I learned about ksp.
I don't mind this, but don't make him an orange guy. Those should be solely worn by the original three IMO.
A kerbal named Kevin is too common, make it a monument, like the monoliths.
Hmm both are nice ideas, but i think if they name a kerbal after him, it should be macleod kerman.
Have a radio tower with his name on it in the KSC

Have a radio tower with his name on it in the KSC

Perfect! maybe on the island with the runway?
